text: tame joso ke surya, suryodayana samaye temani guphani jamani tarapha jhuki jaya che, ane suryastana samaye guphani dabi bajuthi hati jaya che ane te loko guphani paholi jagya'e hata, a allahani nisani'o manthi che, allaha ta'ala jene margadarsana ape te satyamarga para che ane jene te pathabhrasta kari de asakya che ke tame tena mate ko'i madada karanara athava tene margadarsana apavavalo joso
